event.title: the time of the Peshva up to 1 August 1879

data.event: From the time of the Peshva up to 1 August 1879, when Vengurle was made a sub-division, Lanja was the headquarters of a petty division of Rajapur.
The fair is still largely attended (1960), by people of different communities from Lanja and the neighbouring villages.

event.title: come from Rajapur and open temporary booths at which for about a month

data.event: Shopkeepers come from Rajapur and open temporary booths at which for about a month coarse country and imported cloth and miscellaneous articles are sold.
